scenario_text.value: Here I am again.

I just can’t help but get my hopes up,
imagining that maybe I’ll run into Aoi.
I thought I’d find you here, Takuma.
Aoi!

(We’re alone here again! Only, something
seems off...)
What is it? What’s wrong?
You look like something’s bothering you.

Takuma...do you think I’m a burden on the
others?
What? Why would you think that?

This isn’t like you, Aoi. What’s gotten into
you?
Please, Takuma, be honest with me.
Am I a burden on the others?

(This sounds really important! What should
I say to Aoi?)
How should I answer?
What happened?
Were you insulted?
Try a diet!
Look, why don’t you tell me what happened?

Nothing happened. Could you please just
answer my question?

I don’t believe it. If nothing happened, why
would you ask about this?

I mean, I’d be happy to give you my advice.
Seriously, you can tell me anything.
Takuma...
Did someone insult you or something?
What? Wh-why would you think that?!

Well, why else would you be asking me
something like this?

Oh no, it wasn’t like that! It was just...
Uh...
*sob*!
Aoi... Hey, it’s okay. No need to cry.

I’m on your side, all right? I’m here to
help.
No, it’s not that, I just... I’m sorry...
I felt so happy, I couldn’t help it.
You should try a diet!
What? A diet? What are you talking about?

(Oh no! I was so sure that joke would make
her feel better, but she doesn’t get it...)

Oh, you know, because you were asking about
being a burden?
What?!

A burden is heavy, right? So I was saying you
should go on a diet...

(Ugh, this is awful! It’s never funny when
you have to explain a joke...)
Hah! Hahahaha!
Um, Aoi?
I’m sorry, it’s just so funny...

I never took you as the type to joke around
like that, Takuma. Hee hee!
You...thought that was funny?

To tell you the truth, lately I’ve been
starting to worry.

I’ve been wondering if maybe I’ve been
holding everyone else back.

And when I start to feel down about that sort
of thing, I like to come here to be alone.
But I guess recently that’s changed.

Now it’s more like this is where I come when
I want to talk with you.
